title: Unified Inbox
content:
I'm migrating from Microsoft Outlook, but am having some issues with the unified inbox, which is why I wanted to move from Outlook to begin with.

My inbox message counts don't make sense to me... Inbox 233 Account 1 3032 Account 2 1770 Account 3 0

My inbox actually only has like 15 emails in it total, but has a bunch of emails dated 12/31/1969 at 6 PM with no info that I can't delete or archive. How do I get rid of these?!
creator: taylor19

title: Mobile Calendar
content:
It seems that the mobile app works well on my phone, but it doesn't have the calendar function.

How do people get by in this situation? Do you somehow sync the calendar on your phone with this? Note, I do have an Android device.

Thanks!
creator: taylor19

title: I can't get my emails
content: Telstra recently changed email to Telstra webmail
creator: pma02913

title: I get this question dozens of times every day....: "Mozilla Thunderbird Email wants to access your Google Account"  Why would I give Google permissions to access delete or do anything else  to my email and contacts:
content:
WHY AM I GETTING THIS REQUEST... DOZENS OF TIMES A DAY?

Mozilla Thunderbird Email wants to access your Google Account undefined my gmail.com account: This will allow Mozilla Thunderbird Email to:

More info: Read, compose, send, and permanently delete all your email from Gmail Click for more information

More info: See, edit, download, and permanently delete your contacts Click for more information

More info: See, edit, share, and permanently delete all the calendars you can access using Google Calendar Click for more information

By clicking Allow, you allow this app and Google to use your information in accordance with their respective privacy policies. You can change this and other Account Permissions at any time.

HOW CAN I DISALLOW Google to do anything with my account and contacts?
creator: paulholtzheimer

title: linking my Thunderbird Gmail account to Gmail
content:

title: help need to login into Gmail.
content:
I am trying to Login to Gmail. I keep getting the message "server imap.gmail.com with username xxxx@gmail.com failed."and options Retry, EnterNew Password, Cancel I've entered New Password numerous times.

Also, previously when I used Thunderbird with the same account, Thunderbird did recreate the same folder structures/folders as I have setup in Gmail. How do I sync the folder and files to be the same?

title: Would like a Spam folder (in with others on left hand side of page) on email site  (i have put one there but no spam are going into it like on my other devices)
content: As above. I have been getting spam on my other devices but not on my Thunderbird site. Also no emails have come in from our local paper 'The Advertiser' for days as well as other emails. Wonder why? Cannot find them anywhere. (I have deleted a lot but not all from other sites) Thunderbird is not synced with my Apple devices. I have added a Spam folder myself but it obviously not working so what do I need to do?
